definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: Flexible bronchoscope diagnosis and treatment of mycoplasma pneumonia in children.
sentences.chinese: 儿童支原体肺炎的纤维支气管镜诊治研究。

sentences.english: They took him to specialists， but the doctors found nothing wrong with him.
sentences.chinese: 他们带他去找专家诊治，但医生们总觉得他没有毛病。

sentences.english: This study provides an anatomical basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment of tarsal sinus syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 为临床诊治跗骨窦综合征提供解剖学依据。

sentences.english: A couple of weeks ago, I saw a 5-year-old girl who was still wetting the bed every night.
sentences.chinese: 数周前，我诊治了一个五岁了还每晚尿床的小女孩。

sentences.english: To investigate the diagnosis and treatment of breast phyllodes tumor.
sentences.chinese: 总结乳腺叶状肿瘤的诊治情况。

sentences.english: General out-patient attendances refer to cases seen by doctors.
sentences.chinese: 普通科门诊到诊人次指由医生诊治的个案。

sentences.english: Objective To find a method for diagnosis and treatment of hepatic hydatid cyst.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨破裂肝包虫囊肿的诊治方法。

sentences.english: Added or withdrawn from their intial diagnosis to the current consultation.
sentences.chinese: 对最初诊断进行补充或删改，提出当前的诊治意见。

sentences.english: Objective To review the experience with the diagnosis and treatment of malignant pheochromocytoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对恶性嗜铬细胞瘤的诊治水平。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment of the ureteral radiolucent calculi.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高输尿管阴性结石的诊治水平。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience in diagnosis and treatment of liver inflammatory pseudoneoplasm.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结分析18例肝脏炎性假瘤临床诊治情况。

sentences.english: If you have pain and numbness or if the color of the fingers turns pale or dark, come right away.
sentences.chinese: 如果手指疼和发麻或颜色发白或发暗，就马上来诊治。

sentences.english: Objective To study the occurrence, diagnosis and treatment of training trauma of anticraft artillery soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究某高炮部队士兵训练伤的发病和诊治情况。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and treatment of cardiac myxomas and decrease misdiagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨心脏黏液瘤诊治的经验，减少误诊。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical value of B-Us-guided pericardiocentesis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨B超引导下心包穿刺诊治心包积液的价值。

sentences.english: More alarmingly, the treatments based on it are not very effective. Outcomes for psychiatric disorders are no better than in the Victorian period.
sentences.chinese: 现在精神病的诊治结果并不比维多利亚时代的好。

definition: consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
to provide critical care (to a patient or a diseased plant)
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
to visit a patient at home (of a doctor)/house call
to seek medical treatment/to see a doctor
